name: The Phenomenon+
summary:
The Phenomenon is an episodic survival horror game with high replayability. The main character is Barry Nellan, a paranormal researcher whose work is known around the world. Many cases linked to unexplained activity have been studied. Most yielded no real results, but the last one…

In EPISODE 1, you will explore a 3 square kilometer map with over 500 item spawns, use devices for paranormal research, fight creatures with intelligent and tricky AI and discover many other things that make each new unique game.

Compete with other players to take first place on the global leaderboards.
